name: Christina
bio: Chris' first experience with coding came from breaking Tumblr themes until she was creating custom layouts. Fast-forward, working in IT and troubleshooting computer issues, her love for problem-solving grew. Now, she combines creativity and technical skills to build beautiful & functional UIs. She hopes to create an inclusive space to share her passion for coding.
likes: crafts and starting DIY projects i'll never finish
title: Chief of the Coding Divas
